name: fnetg
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))

stmt.origin: simprbi(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wa(wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[Fne]c1 → c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1))
⊣ (c0[Fne]c1 ↔(⋃ c0 = ⋃ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wa(wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0[Fne]c1 → c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1))
⊣ (c0[Fne]c1 ↔(⋃ c0 = ⋃ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wa(wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))))
-| wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c0))
-| wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))
-| wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c0))
-| wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c1))

|- wi(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))
-| wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c1))
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))

comment: A finer cover generates a topology finer than the original set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
